mapper.sql: (select count(*) from cc_cpn_issue where prm_no = #{prmNo} and org_cpn_iss_no is null) as total_cnt, (select count(*) from cc_cpn_issue where prm_no = #{prmNo} and mbr_no = #{mbrNo} and org_cpn_iss_no is null) as mbr_cnt
mapper.select:
select ci.*,
from cup_info as ci where 1 = 1 and ci.use_yn = 'Y' and ci.prm_no = #{prmNo}

select ci.*, iss.cup_iss_no
from cup_info as ci inner join cc_cpn_issue as iss on ci.prm_no = iss.prm_no where 1 = 1 and ci.use_yn = 'Y' and iss.cpn_cert_no = #{cpnCertNo}
